description: Write a children's story in the style of Aesop's Fables teaching a life lesson specified by the user
name: default

dimensions.description: What elements contribute to a well-structured children's story?
dimensions.label: Story Structure

sub_dimensions.description: Does the story have a clear beginning, middle, and end?
sub_dimensions.label: Plot Structure

sub_dimensions.description: Is there a conflict introduced early in the story that drives the plot?
sub_dimensions.label: Conflict Introduction

sub_dimensions.description: Is the resolution of the conflict clear and satisfying?
sub_dimensions.label: Resolution Clarity

dimensions.description: How do characters evolve in a children's story?
dimensions.label: Character Development

sub_dimensions.description: Does the story include characters that are relatable for children?
sub_dimensions.label: Character Presence

sub_dimensions.description: Do the characters demonstrate growth or change by the end of the story?
sub_dimensions.label: Character Development

sub_dimensions.description: Is the dialogue between characters natural and age-appropriate?
sub_dimensions.label: Dialogue Quality

dimensions.description: What makes a story engaging for children?
dimensions.label: Narrative Engagement

sub_dimensions.description: Is the story engaging and likely to hold a child's interest?
sub_dimensions.label: Engaging Narrative

sub_dimensions.description: Does the story use vivid imagery to help children visualize the scenes?
sub_dimensions.label: Imagery Use

sub_dimensions.description: Does the story incorporate repetitive elements that aid in comprehension and retention?
sub_dimensions.label: Repetitive Elements

dimensions.description: How can language be tailored for children's understanding?
dimensions.label: Language Appropriateness

sub_dimensions.description: Is the language used in the story appropriate for children's understanding?
sub_dimensions.label: Language Simplicity

sub_dimensions.description: Is the story an appropriate length for a children's tale (not exceeding 1000 words)?
sub_dimensions.label: Length Appropriateness

dimensions.description: How can stories convey moral lessons while being culturally sensitive?
dimensions.label: Moral and Cultural Sensitivity

sub_dimensions.description: Does the story clearly convey a specified life lesson?
sub_dimensions.label: Moral Clarity

sub_dimensions.description: Does the story reiterate the moral lesson at the end?
sub_dimensions.label: Life Lesson Reiteration

sub_dimensions.description: Is the content culturally sensitive and inclusive for all children?
sub_dimensions.label: Cultural Sensitivity

dimensions.description: How can illustrations enhance a children's story?
dimensions.label: Illustration Integration

sub_dimensions.description: Does the story provide opportunities for illustrations that enhance the narrative?
sub_dimensions.label: Illustration Suggestions
